title: 83/168/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 April 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Cordin - Rotating Mirror Streak Camera, model 132, with accessories' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 April 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Cordin - Rotating Mirror Streak Camera, model 132, with accessories' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/168/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Cordin - Rotating Mirror Streak Camera, model 132, with accessories', which is the subject of an application by the Netherlands of 4 October 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
